input.label: Target Host (please input exact interface name)

chart.title: Errors In
chart.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | stats avg(errors_in) by target_host

chart.title: Errors Out
chart.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | stats avg(errors_out) by target_host

chart.title: Discards In
chart.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | stats avg(discards_in) by target_host

chart.title: Discards Out
chart.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | stats avg(discards_out) by target_host

table.title: Errors and Discards
table.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | table target_host discards_in discards_out errors_in errors_out
